title: Eyes in the sky: The increasing importance of very low Earth orbit (VLEO) for national security
summary: As space gets more crowded, very low Earth orbit (VLEO) will be a critical domain for military Earth observation.

title: Blue Origin gets U.S. Space Force funding for New Glenn ‘integration studies’
summary: Blue Origin has secured an $18 million contract with the U.S. Space Force for integration studies related to its New Glenn launch vehicle.

title: ESA and EU collaborate on launch initiative
summary: The European Space Agency and European Commission have selected five launch companies to participate in a new program to provide flight opportunities for new technologies, a sign of a greater role the European Union seeks to play in launch.

title: Daily Telescope: Shooting a laser into the sky from Antarctica
summary: "The camera is looking roughly south across McMurdo Sound and the Ross Ice Shelf."

title: Orbit Fab and ClearSpace to develop in-space refueling service
summary: Orbit Fab and ClearSpace see opportunities to work together on mission extension, transportation and other mobility and logistics services.
